item.title: How to Resolve VSCode Syntax Highlighting Issue
item.author: Peter G. Chang
item.description: The Problem I’ve started to experience significant delays in trivial tasks on VSCode. For example, every time I pressed the enter button, it would take >3 seconds for the cursor to move to the next line. This was, for obvious reasons, extremely frustrating and significantly hampered with my productivity as well as the desire to engage in programming. In addition, at some point, the syntax highlighting stopped working. I’d assumed these were orthogonal issues, but they were not!
